mapper.select: SELECT ar.`label_id` AS id, lab.`name` AS name , COUNT(c.`id`) AS comment_num FROM tb_ask_reply AS ar LEFT JOIN tb_label lab ON ( lab.`id` = ar.`label_id` ) LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON( c.`ext_type` = ar.`ext_type` AND c.`record_id` = ar.`id` ) WHERE ar.`ext_type` = #{type} AND lab.`id` != 1 GROUP BY ar.`label_id` ORDER BY comment_num DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
